name: Crazy Uber
description:
Crazy Uber is a clearly satirical game of vehicular mayhem. Pick up and drop off fares, but beware the cabbies who will attack on sight.

Created by Jonathan Doda and Daniel Lister for TOJam 11, with sound and music by Chris Pauley and 2D art by Robert Lopatto.

To see how we did it, visit https://github.com/TeamAwesomeTOJam/CrazyUber.
